pli-tv-pvr2.15:1.1: Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.15:1.2: Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.15:1.3: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe…. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.15:2.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.15:2.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.15:2.3: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #2
